languages.text: "Недопонимание между нашими видами — обычное дело, элантах. Я и не надеялась, что ты сможешь в полной мере осознать сказанное... Но все же предполагала, что твой разум способен на большее".
"Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."
languages.original_text: "Недопонимание между нашими видами — обычное дело, элантах. Я и не надеялась, что ты сможешь в полной мере осознать сказанное... Но все же предполагала, что твой разум способен на большее".

traits.locale_text: "Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."
"Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."
"Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."
"Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."

languages.text: «La falta de entendimiento entre nuestras especies es normal, elantach. Me imaginaba que no serías capaz de comprenderlo todo... pero sí albergaba la esperanza de que tu mente fuese más despierta».
languages.original_text: "Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."

traits.locale_text: «La falta de entendimiento entre nuestras especies es normal, elantach. Me imaginaba que no serías capaz de comprenderlo todo... pero sí albergaba la esperanza de que tu mente fuese más despierta».

languages.text: 「互いの種族について理解するのはそう簡単なことではない、エランタ。我が言ったことをすべて理解してくれるとは思っていなかったが…今より少しでも理解してくれるだろうと、期待はしていた」
languages.original_text: "Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."

traits.locale_text: 「互いの種族について理解するのはそう簡単なことではない、エランタ。我が言ったことをすべて理解してくれるとは思っていなかったが…今より少しでも理解してくれるだろうと、期待はしていた」

languages.text: “我很清楚，你我两个族群都对彼此缺乏了解，外界人。我并不期待你能够完全理解我所说的这番话……不过，我本以为你的思维能力不止于此。”
languages.original_text: "Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."

traits.locale_text: “我很清楚，你我两个族群都对彼此缺乏了解，外界人。我并不期待你能够完全理解我所说的这番话……不过，我本以为你的思维能力不止于此。”

languages.text: « Il est dans la nature de nos races de ne pas se comprendre, elantach. Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que vous saisissiez tout ce qui a été dit... J'espérais néanmoins que votre esprit serait capable de mieux. »
languages.original_text: "Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."

traits.locale_text: « Il est dans la nature de nos races de ne pas se comprendre, elantach. Je ne m'attendais pas à ce que vous saisissiez tout ce qui a été dit... J'espérais néanmoins que votre esprit serait capable de mieux. »

languages.text: "Ein Mangel an Verständnis zwischen unseren Spezies ist zu erwarten, Elantach. Ich war nicht davon ausgegangen, dass Ihr alles Gesagte versteht ... Dennoch hatte ich gehofft, dass Euer Verstand zu mehr fähig wäre."
languages.original_text: "Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Mangel an Verständnis zwischen unseren Spezies ist zu erwarten, Elantach. Ich war nicht davon ausgegangen, dass Ihr alles Gesagte versteht ... Dennoch hatte ich gehofft, dass Euer Verstand zu mehr fähig wäre."

languages.text: "Türlerimiz arasında anlaşmazlık olması normal elantach. Söylenenlerin tamamını anlayacağını düşünmemiştim zaten... Fakat zihninin daha fazlasını başarabileceğini ümit etmiştim."
languages.original_text: "Lack of understanding between our kinds is to be expected, elantach. I did not assume that you would grasp all of what was said... Nevertheless, I did hope that your mind would be capable of more."

traits.locale_text: "Türlerimiz arasında anlaşmazlık olması normal elantach. Söylenenlerin tamamını anlayacağını düşünmemiştim zaten... Fakat zihninin daha fazlasını başarabileceğini ümit etmiştim."
